title: U.S. drone strikes in Yemen 2011 to 2019
summary: In general Number of drone strikes has fallen over the Year.
Number of drone strikes is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, and lastly roughly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Number of drone strikes, of value 37.0 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Number of drone strikes about 17.0 was reached at Year 2014
